Release branch for common 2.0.14 (#971)

Merge release/2.0.14

Release 2.0.15 - Merge to Master (#979)

* Preparing API side of DCF protocol, added some skeleton classes

* Detect Broker Process during encryption/decryption (#963)

* Adding "junk data" tests to the MSAL Cache (#964)

* Adding "junk data" tests

* Moving consts

* Refining tests for exactness

* Convert test case to use a switch

* Applying changes to other tests

* Slight refactor

* DCF Testing constant added, enables testing in MSAL for DCF

* Suggestions from team

* removed static field in DeviceCodeFlowCommand

* More fixes from suggestions

* Release branch for common 2.0.14 (#971) (#972)

Merge release/2.0.14

* renamed method in DeviceCodeFlowCommandCallback

* Adding Locale.Root to toLowerCase calls

* Update changelog for 2.0.12-hf1 deployment (#976)

* Empty commit to stage branch

* Update changelog for 2.0.15

* Update Device.java for 1.5.6-RC1

* Update version.properties to 2.0.15-RC1

* Update Device.java version for 1.6.0

* Update version.properties for 2.0.15

* Update changelog for #963
